hadiths.text: Nu'man b. Bashir, reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) had said:Have you, besides him, other sons? He said: Yes. Thereupon he (the Holy Prophet) said: Have you given gifts to all of them like this (as you have given to Nu'man)? He said: No. Thereupon he (the Holy Prophet) said: I cannot bear witness to an injustice

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ تَفْضِيلِ بَعْضِ الأَوْلاَدِ فِي الْهِبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Favor Some Of One's Children Over Others In Gift-Giving
